head.citation-title: 13th International Conference on Intelligent Computing, ICIC 2017
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 212 papers. The special focus in this conference is on Intelligent Computing. The topics include: Gbest-guided covariance matrix adaptation evolution strategy for large scale global optimization; a fast approximate hypervolume calculation method by a novel decomposition strategy; towards the differentiation of initial and final retention in massive open online courses; an evolutionary algorithm for autonomous agents with spiking neural networks; sparse reconstruction with bat algorithm and orthogonal matching pursuit; data transfer and extension for mining big meteorological data; a review of image recognition with deep convolutional neural network; enhance a deep neural network model for twitter sentiment analysis by incorporating user behavioral information; topological structure analysis of developmental spiking neural networks; a unified deep neural network for scene text detection; exploring the new application of morphological neural networks; evolutionary metaphor of genetic encoding for self-organizable robots; hybrid coordinating algorithm for flying robots; a method to detecting ventricular tachycardia and ventricular fibrillation based on symbol entropy and wavelet analysis; saliency-guided smoothing for 3D point clouds; color two dimensional principal component analysis for face recognition based on quaternion model; image recognition using local features based NNSC model; a hashing image retrieval method based on deep learning and local feature fusion; anomaly detection by analyzing the pedestrian behavior and the dynamic changes of behavior; locality preserving projections with adaptive neighborhood size and automatic tongue image segmentation for traditional Chinese medicine using deep neural network.

translated-sourcetitle.$: Lecture Notes in Computer Science (including subseries Lecture Notes in Artificial Intelligence and Lecture Notes in Bioinformatics)
